#define SUME CRYPTO ID OFFSET 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO ID DEFAULT 0x0000DA01
#define SUME CRYPTO ID WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO VERSION OFFSET 0x4
#define SUME CRYPTO VERSION DEFAULT 0x1
#define SUME CRYPTO VERSION WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO RESET OFFSET 0x8
#define SUME CRYPTO RESET DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO RESET WIDTH 16
#define SUME CRYPTO FLIP OFFSET 0xC
#define SUME CRYPTO FLIP DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO FLIP WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO DEBUG OFFSET 0x10
#define SUME CRYPTO DEBUG DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO DEBUG WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO PKTIN OFFSET 0x14
#define SUME CRYPTO PKTIN DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO PKTIN WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO PKTOUT OFFSET 0x18
#define SUME CRYPTO PKTOUT DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO PKTOUT WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO ETHERTYPE OFFSET 0x1C
#define SUME CRYPTO ETHERTYPE DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO ETHERTYPE WIDTH 16
#define SUME CRYPTO TCI OFFSET 0x20
#define SUME CRYPTO TCI DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO TCI WIDTH 8
#define SUME CRYPTO SLEN OFFSET 0x24
#define SUME CRYPTO SLEN DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO SLEN WIDTH 8
#define SUME CRYPTO PNUM OFFSET 0x28
#define SUME CRYPTO PNUM DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO PNUM WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO ICV OFFSET 0x2C
#define SUME CRYPTO ICV DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO ICV WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO MACSEC_PKTS OFFSET 0x30
#define SUME CRYPTO MACSEC_PKTS DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO MACSEC_PKTS WIDTH 32
#define SUME CRYPTO OTHER_PKTS OFFSET 0x34
#define SUME CRYPTO OTHER_PKTS DEFAULT 0x0
#define SUME CRYPTO OTHER_PKTS WIDTH 32
#define  SUME CRYPTO MEM_TESTMEM WIDTH 32
#define  SUME CRYPTO MEM_TESTMEM DEPTH 1024
#define  SUME CRYPTO MEM_TESTMEM ADDRESS 0x0
